commitmsg: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:vmware-ac/acm
Added functionality to fetch the objects and groups that a user belongs to
Add API design doc from UAA repository.
Added API to get the list of users that have access to an object
Added functionality to fetch the users for an object along with it's permissions
Removed non working readme
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:vmware-ac/acm
new repository for ACM
Minor fixes to the start up
Added test cases for user groups to the check_access
Added support for check access
Better timing info
Logging update so that sensitive info is not logged
Added timing support for the api

Additional tests to the groups
Post request now returns the location in the header
Initial code for the group controller along with basic test
Updates for group support to the controller tests
Added support for both users and groups during object creation
Added support for creating groups
Minor fixes to handle the user id correctly in the add_permission method

The code now creates the user on the fly.
Changed the schema to necessitate u: and g: in the request to create an object.
Replaced the sequel test setup code with acm code in the tests

Added support for creation and retrieval of permission sets.
Added tests for the service and the controller
Added support for permission set creation
Changed object type to permission_sets
Deletes should be in a transaction
Minor bug fix

Added object get and delete.

Added tests for the same.
Renamed acls to acl

Improved coverage of tests
Added functionality to create acls along with objects
Added code and tests to create objects
Refactored the object route. Added failing test for object creation
More tests, fixed some bugs with the joins to fetch permissions.
Fixed a bug where multiple subjects were not being bound correctly to an ace
Minor change to the test name

Modified the schema to add a many to many from ace to subjects
updated the code accordingly.

Tests to add a permission to an object for a user now pass
Fixed bugs with some of the relationships
Minor fix to the db schema
Added failing test for add_permission functionality that needs to be built
Additional user creation tests pass
Changed the user/groups model along with a user service, added some tests
Fixed unit tests for the object service
Tests are now set up. First set of tests are passing.
Ignore the test logs
Replace load with require for the api controller
Added models for each of the tables
Updated Gemfile and rake tasks for running unit tests.
Added a missing drop entry in the migration

Updated the db migration to add many to many
from an object to a permission set
Added a readme
Separate the sinatra routes into multiple files.

Minor updates to the startup logging. Moved the basic auth
to the rack controller.
Basic auth for the acm controller
Updated error handling

Log files added to the repo.
The log folder is for development only.

The server now starts

Log file is initialized.

Creating the acm repo.

Added the database migration that uses sequel.

Updates/Cleanup to the ACM documentation
